page.title: 10Sporting Activities
page.content: When it comes to sport the area has some of almost everything. Whilst it is first a rugby stronghold, in winter both soccer and hockey have many followers and in summer the cricket club is progressive and strong. There is an outdoor swimming pool which is well used though everyone yearns for an indoor one. Bowls, tennis, golf and yacht clubs have been active for many years. Indoors, a new sports hall has given opportunities for badminton, squash, netball, basketball, indoor cricket nets, indoor soccer and even archery. Another centre provides for boxing, judo and keep fit classes and a snooker hall gives enjoyment of this very popular pastime. With many anglers using the well stocked lake in the Trust grounds there is recreation for all tastes.
